question:
Arrange the following events in the order of their chronology: 1.August Offer
2.Poona Pact
3.Third Round Table Conference Choose the correct option:
explanation: The Poona Pact was signed between B.R. Ambedkar and M.K. Gandhi in 1932 regarding the political representation of the Depressed Classes. Third Round Table Conference was held in 1932 (November â€“ December). The August Offer was made by Lord Linlithgow in 1940. The offer promised the expansion of the Executive Council of the Viceroy of India and inclusion of more Indians.
